sentences.sContent: Both faculty and students oppose the measures.
sentences.sCn: 教师和学生都反对这些措施。

sentences.sContent: ...Mitch Daniels asked the faculty to prove that their students have actually achieved one of higher education’s most important goals: critical thinking skills...
...And faculty members will be wary of any change that threatens the core curriculum in the name of moving students into the workforce...
...College faculty members are afraid that the pretext of moving students into the workforce might pose a threat to...
...Another risk: the new campus schedules might eventually produce less revenue for the institution and longer working hours for faculty members...
...makes faculty turnover—critical for a university to remain current in changing times—difficult...

理学院；科学院；自然科学系
